text: Create new property with dropdown select not allowed. I am on HubSpot crm free plan, and i try to add new property and the only option i get is the single-line text option. Can anyone help??

When create new property the Group field cannot be changed from the default which is "Contact information" and the Field type cannot be changed from the default of "Single-line text". How can i change them??
Also, please consider asking these questions in the <#C22PU4LV8|general> chat. This channel is for introductions

hi bradley, if it was that simple i would not have asked if any one knows. What you suggested is trival and that is what i do. But it do not let me change the default settings in the fields as i stated above. That means that there is something more than that. And for your second suggesting i can accept that. But this channel name is not introductions to the CMS but problems of someone who enters HubSpot as i am, it is called new to HubSpot cms isn't it??
Hi everyone, i have question, the cms of HubSpot is only a landing pages, blogs and Hubdb or there is something more?

He did point you in the right direction. If those options are greyed out for you and you cannot change them it might be because that property is one of HubSpot's defaults. Those fields can't be deleted or edited, most of those seem to be under company properties. You can create a new one if you want to change the defaults.
Hey Diego! You can also manage standard website pages on the CMS.
I'm new on HubSpot, how management a site on HubSpot?
I need enable some service to habilite the cms of HubSpot?
Not a problem Diego. The HubSpot CMS is a standalone product, and would need to be added to your account if you're currently only subscribed to a marketing package
Hi Lindsey, thanks for responding. I know about HubSpot properties defaults. I did talk about any new property i try - like for example aaa below. It seems that i miss something.
